abstract.text: Retrieves the (possibly keyframed) value of a pathID parameter at a given time.

inlineContent.text: Receives the path ID of the parameter at the given time.
Specified time to get the value.
if the pathID is retrieved successfully;
Depending on the host application, the time value may be relative to the start of the timeline or to the start of the clip. See
